name: Revelation Tennis
description:
Lucifer wants to take control over the earth from you (god), and It is finally time to settle this once and for all. In the only way possible for such a high stakes battle. A game of Tennis.

Controls:

A- Move

Left Mouse - Hit

Fullscreen for score.

Whoever beats the set gets to control the world, Lucifer insisted on only playing one set as he is busy later.
